column3: Pasta, tomato sauce, cheese, mushrooms, ground beef
column4: Layer the tomato sauce, cheese, mushrooms and group beef between the Pasta, bake for 30 minutes at 375F

column3: 16-24 oz steaks (8-12oz each, steak of choice) 2 tbsp butter 2 cloves garlic (or more, if you love garlic) 2 sprigs thyme
